name: Rite Bros. Aviation, Inc.
about: At Rite Bros. Aviation, Inc., we are dedicated to providing top-notch flight training in a unique and supportive environment. Located at Fairchild Airport in Washington, our facility offers the benefits of long runways and instrument approaches, combined with the relaxed atmosphere of a country strip. Our fleet includes Cessna 172s, ideal for initial learning as well as advanced Instrument, Commercial, and Flight Instructor training. Our instructors, such as Jeff Well with over two decades of flying experience, bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to guide both new and experienced pilots. Whether you aim to fly for pleasure or pursue a career in aviation, we are committed to helping you achieve your flying goals with professional instruction and a smile. Come and experience the freedom of flying with Rite Bros. Aviation.
